abstract: Exelon is executing its hostile bid for NRG Energy in military-like fashion; it is not like those quirky technology hostile offers we’ve seen pass before us.
lead_paragraph: Exelon is executing its hostile bid for NRG Energy in military-like fashion; it is not like those quirky technology hostile offers we’ve seen pass before us.

headline.main: Exelon’s Fight and the Coming Rise in Hostile Activity
